metadata.title: CVE-2019-15679 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: TightVNC code version 1.3.10 contains heap buffer overflow inInitialiseRFBConnection function, which can potentially result codeexecution. This attack appear to be exploitable via network connectivity.

criterions.comment: libvncserver: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
x11vnc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
